full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB CHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS MCHOD BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031A *, ,(ZHES LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB CHOG DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS MCHOD BYA TSUL GA-YANG 'GUG BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SGRUB THABS RIN BYUNG DANG, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG PO MDZAD PA'I GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GTOR CHOG SOGS LA @031B GZHER BYAS TE, GO SLA ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR BLO LHUN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'BYUNG GNAS SO, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA DES PAR PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
